verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w had|strong="G1209"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w received|strong="G1209"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* was come \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, they that \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \w contended|strong="G1252"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Thou wentest \w in|strong="G1525"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w uncircumcised|strong="G0203"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* didst eat \w with|strong="G4906"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w rehearsed|strong="G0756"\w* \add the matter\add* from the \w beginning|strong="G0756"\w*, and \w expounded|strong="G1620"\w* \add it\add* by \w order|strong="G2517"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*,

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G2252"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* of \w Joppa|strong="G2445"\w* \w praying|strong="G4336"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w trance|strong="G1611"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* a \w vision|strong="G3705"\w*, A \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w vessel|strong="G4632"\w* \w descend|strong="G2597"\w*, as it had \w been|strong="G5613"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w sheet|strong="G3607"\w*, let \w down|strong="G2524"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* by \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w corners|strong="G0746"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it \w came|strong="G2064"\w* even \w to|strong="G0891"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*:

\w Upon|strong="G1519"\w* the \w which|strong="G3739"\w* when I had fastened mine \w eyes|strong="G0816"\w*, I \w considered|strong="G2657"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* fourfooted \w beasts|strong="G5074"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* wild \w beasts|strong="G2342"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* creeping \w things|strong="G2062"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fowls|strong="G4071"\w* of the \w air|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w Arise|strong="G0450"\w*, \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*; \w slay|strong="G2380"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w eat|strong="G5315"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, Not \w so|strong="G3365"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3956"\w* \w common|strong="G2839"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* hath at any \w time|strong="G3763"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w again|strong="G1208"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w What|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w cleansed|strong="G2511"\w*, \add that\add* \w call|strong="G2840"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w common|strong="G2840"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* was \w done|strong="G1096"\w* three \w times|strong="G5151"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w* were drawn \w up|strong="G0385"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w immediately|strong="G1824"\w* there were \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* already \w come|strong="G2186"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* the \w house|strong="G3614"\w* \w where|strong="G3739"\w* I \w was|strong="G1510"\w*, \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Cæsarea|strong="G2542"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w bade|strong="G2036"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* go \w with|strong="G4905"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* \w doubting|strong="G1252"\w*. \w Moreover|strong="G1161"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w six|strong="G1803"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w accompanied|strong="G2064"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* we \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w man’s|strong="G0435"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*:

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* he \w shewed|strong="G0518"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* he had \w seen|strong="G1492"\w* an \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, which \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Send|strong="G0649"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Joppa|strong="G2445"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* call \w for|strong="G3343"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w*, whose surname \w is|strong="G1941"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*;

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* shall \w tell|strong="G2980"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w*, \w whereby|strong="G3739"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w* shall be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w I|strong="G3165"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*, the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* \w fell|strong="G1968"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w as|strong="G5618"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* the \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* remembered \w I|strong="G3415"\w* the \w word|strong="G4487"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, how \w that|strong="G5613"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w John|strong="G2491"\+w* \+w indeed|strong="G3303"\+w* \+w baptized|strong="G0907"\+w* \+w with water|strong="G5204"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w shall be baptized|strong="G0907"\+w* \+w with|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the Holy|strong="G0040"\+w* \+w Ghost|strong="G4151"\+w*.\wj*

\w Forasmuch|strong="G1487"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* the \w like|strong="G2470"\w* \w gift|strong="G1431"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \add he did\add* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, who \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*; \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w was|strong="G2252"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w*, that I \w could|strong="G1415"\w* \w withstand|strong="G2967"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*?

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, they held their \w peace|strong="G2270"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Then|strong="G0686"\w* \w hath|strong="G1325"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w granted|strong="G1325"\w* \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

¶ \w Now|strong="G3767"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* which were scattered \w abroad|strong="G1289"\w* \w upon|strong="G0575"\w* the \w persecution|strong="G2347"\w* that \w arose|strong="G1096"\w* \w about|strong="G1909"\w* \w Stephen|strong="G4736"\w* \w travelled|strong="G1330"\w* as far \w as|strong="G2193"\w* \w Phenice|strong="G5403"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Cyprus|strong="G2954"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w*, \w preaching|strong="G2980"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* to \w none|strong="G3367"\w* \w but|strong="G1487"\w* unto the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* of \w Cyprus|strong="G2953"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Cyrene|strong="G2956"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w*, when they were \w come|strong="G1525"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w*, \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w Grecians|strong="G1675"\w*, \w preaching|strong="G2097"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G5037"\w* a \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w number|strong="G0706"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*, and \w turned|strong="G1994"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w tidings|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* these \w things|strong="G0846"\w* \w came|strong="G0191"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w ears|strong="G3775"\w* of the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* which \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they sent \w forth|strong="G1821"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w*, that he should \w go|strong="G1330"\w* as far \w as|strong="G2193"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w*, when he \w came|strong="G3854"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* had \w seen|strong="G1492"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, was \w glad|strong="G5463"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w exhorted|strong="G3870"\w* them \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, that with \w purpose|strong="G4286"\w* of \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* they would \w cleave|strong="G4357"\w* unto the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w full|strong="G4134"\w* of the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w much|strong="G2425"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w* was \w added|strong="G4369"\w* unto the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.
\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w departed|strong="G1831"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Tarsus|strong="G5019"\w*, for to \w seek|strong="G0327"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, he \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to pass, \w that|strong="G1096"\w* a \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w year|strong="G1763"\w* they \w assembled|strong="G4863"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w much|strong="G2425"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w*. \w And|strong="G5037"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* were \w called|strong="G5537"\w* \w Christians|strong="G5546"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w came|strong="G2718"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* there stood \w up|strong="G0450"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Agabus|strong="G0013"\w*, and \w signified|strong="G4591"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* that there \w should|strong="G3195"\w* \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w dearth|strong="G3042"\w* \w throughout|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* the \w world|strong="G3625"\w*: \w which|strong="G3748"\w* came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the days of \w Claudius|strong="G2804"\w* \w Cæsar|strong="G2541"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* according \w to|strong="G2531"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w ability|strong="G2141"\w*, \w determined|strong="G3724"\w* to \w send|strong="G3992"\w* \w relief|strong="G1248"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w dwelt|strong="G2730"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w*:

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* they \w did|strong="G4160"\w*, and sent \w it|strong="G0649"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* of \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w*.
